import_from_file.name: import_from_file
import_from_file.description: Imports long term statistic values (1h) from tsv/csv file

filename.name: filename
filename.description: The file containing the statistic data, to be put into the config folder

delimiter.name: delimiter
delimiter.description: The delimiter between fields. Default is empty (auto-detect is tried)

decimal.name: decimal
decimal.description: The decimal separator. Default is '.'; set to true to use ','

datetime_format.name: datetime_format
datetime_format.description: The format of the datetime strings. Default is '%d.%m.%Y %H:%M'. d .. day, m .. month, y .. Year, H .. hour, M .. minute

unit_from_entity.name: unit_from_entity
unit_from_entity.description: True: Take unit from existing entity (only valid for internal statistics, e.g. sensor.sun_solar_azimuth); False: Take unit from own column in imported data

create_fitness_component.name: create_fitness_component
create_fitness_component.description: Discovers a fitness tracker device for later configuration

component_name.name: component_name
component_name.description: Unique identifier for the fitness tracker (alphanumeric and underscores only)

vendor.name: vendor
vendor.description: The vendor/manufacturer name of the fitness tracker

device_info.name: device_info
device_info.description: Additional device information (model, manufacturer, software/hardware versions)

entities.name: entities
entities.description: List of fitness data entities to track (steps, heart rate, etc.)

discovery.title: Discovered Fitness Trackers
discovery.description:
The following fitness trackers have been discovered. Select one to add to Home Assistant:

{options}

abort.no_discovered_trackers: No fitness trackers have been discovered yet. Use the create_fitness_component service to discover a tracker first.
abort.tracker_not_found: The selected fitness tracker could not be found.
abort.not_confirmed: Fitness tracker addition was not confirmed.
abort.already_configured: This fitness tracker has already been configured.
